subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: The Premier League title race took an unexpected twist when Manchester City relegated Wolverhampton with a 2-0 victory to move to 3 points behind first-place Manchester United, which blew a two-goal lead and tied Everton, 4-4.
snippet: The Premier League title race took an unexpected twist when Manchester City relegated Wolverhampton with a 2-0 victory to move to 3 points behind first-place Manchester United, which blew a two-goal lead and tied Everton, 4-4.
